subject: Re: one time setUp and tearDown
msgSnippet: Speaking of one time setUp, I am interested to know how often this technique is used (especially for integration tests) and the kind of problems (if any) that
messageBody:
Speaking of one time setUp, I am interested to know how often this
technique is used (especially for integration tests) and the kind of
problems (if any) that were encountered.

Thanks for the feedback

-Vladimir

Vladimir R. Bossicard
